categories: X-SYNC 2 DM 3mm Offset Eagle Chain Ring
description: Designed specifically to work with SRAM's Eagle™ drivetrain, this chainring has a longer, positive-rake tooth shape that works perfectly with the Eagle™ chain for improved chain retention, decreased wear and optimal pedalling efficiency.3mm offset (for GXP Boost or BB30).Increases chain retention and lifespan and decreases friction and noise.Designed for use with the Eagle™ chain.
name: SRAM X-SYNC 2 DM 3mm Offset Eagle Chain Ring
